Plot Summary: April, Courtney and Monica are wild, beautiful and intelligent college freshmen cheerleaders, but when they put their pompoms down these girls turn into deadly weapons. Trained as ninjas by Sensei Hiroshi (George Takei) they spend their days studying and their nights stripping to pay their way through college. But when their Sensei is kidnapped by the mob the girls must turn to their secret ninja skills to help save him. Along the way theyll have to dodge a nosy cop, keep their parents at bay and to top it off, defeat a slew of mafia hitmen. Cheerleading is no easy game, especially when youre ninjas!
